question: Which state government has launched 'Jan Soochna Portal'?
explanation: In Jaipur, the Rajasthan government has launched  a \'Jan Soochna Portal\' to provide information about government authorities and departments suo motu to the public in the true spirit of the Right To Information (RTI) Act. It is claimed that the site is the first of its kind in India that  will bring transparency and accountability, and empower the right of the people to seek information.
